Can also cure the effect of the Amnesia pill

+1 Soul Heart

title: Rune of Ansuz
description: When used, reveals the entire map including all the secret room locations and other icon rooms

title: Rune of Perthro
description: Rerolls all pedestal items in the current room (One time use of the D6)

title: Rune of Berkano
description: Summons 3 blue friendly spiders and 3 blue flies

title: Rune of Algiz
description: When used, gives you an invincibility effect which lasts for 20 seconds

title: Blank Rune
description:
When used, gives a random Mystic rune effect

Possible effects include: Algiz, Ansuz, Berkano, Dagaz, Ehwaz, Hagalaz, Jera, Perthro

Also has a 25% chance to spawn another Blank Rune upon use

title: Black Rune
description:
When used, this rune deals 40 damage to all enemies in the room and consumes all pedestal items in the room, giving you a random stat increase for each item consumed

Also consumes all pickups in the room and turns them into blue flies and spiders

title: Rune Shard
description:
Activates a random rune effect. The effect is weaker than normal runes.

These only appear if not all runes have been unlocked yet.

title: Dice Shard
description: Gives a one-time use of the D6 and D20 effects at the same time

title: Emergency Contact
description: When used will cause two of Mom's Hand to come down and grab a random enemy

title: Holy Card
description:
Grants the Holy Mantle effect for, which will negate your next hit of damage

The effect persist between rooms/floors

Tainted Lost starts with this card, and while playing as this character all cards and runes have a 10% chance to turn into a Holy Card

title: Cracked Key
description:
This is a one-time use of the Red Key item.

The main purpose of the Cracked Key is to unlock Tainted character in the Home floor without needing to find the Red Key. You can force spawn a cracked key by droping any trinket in a Boss Room or Item room, on any floor on your way down to Depths II. When you take the reverse path back up to Home, the trinket will turn into Cracked Key in the same floor/room you dropped it before.

title: O - The Fool?
description:
When used, this card drops all of your hearts (including non-red hearts), coins, keys and bombs on the floor

This effect is done in the most efficient way possible - e.g. if you have 99 coins it will create 3 x Quarters, 2 Dimes and 4 Pennies. If you have 40 bombs it will spawn 4 x Boom! pedestal items

Picking up all dropped items leaves you with the same health and consumables you had before

This allows you to manipulate your consumables in lots of different ways, for example by rerolling them with the D6/D20, re-arrange your Bone heart containers and more

If you have the Tarot Cloth item, this card will also drop all your passive items on the floor as pedestals

title: I - The Magician?
description:
Gives you a blue aura that repels enemy projectiles, causing them to slowly curve away from Isaac and avoid hitting him

Lasts for 60 seconds

title: II - The High Priestess?
description: Causes Mom's Foot to keep stomping down randomly for 60 seconds where Isaac is standing

title: III - The Empress?
description: Gives 2 HP Up and +1.5 Tears Up for 60 seconds

title: IV - The Emperor?
description:
Teleports you to an extra boss room, that drops a Boss room item as normal. This room isn't part of the actual floor, and leaving it returns you to where you teleported from

The boss isn't necessarily from the current floor - e.g. you could find a caves boss in the basement

title: V - The Hierophant?
description: Spawns 2 Bone hearts on the floor

title: VI - The Lovers?
description:
Spawns a random pedestal item from the current room's item pool

In exchange, turns one heart container or 2 soul hearts into a broken heart. Broken hearts permanently subtract from your total possible health containers

title: VII - The Chariot?
description: Isaac turns to stone and can't move for 10 seconds, but your tear rate goes up significantly for the duration

title: VIII - Justice?
pickup: "May your sins come back to torment you"
description: Spawns 2-4 locked gold chests

title: IX - The Hermit?
pickup: "May you see the value of all things in life"
description: When used, all items and pickups in the current room are turned into money. Everything is sold for its shop price, e.g. Items for 15c, hearts for 3c, sacks for 7c

title: X - Wheel of Fortune?
description:
Activates a random effect from a Dice room

See the dice icon above for each possible effect

title: XI - Strength?
description: All enemies in the current room are slowed and take double damage

title: XII - The Hanged Man?
description:
You turn into the Keeper, gaining triple shot, -0.1 Speed Down for 30 seconds

Enemies drop random coins while this effect is active

title: XIII - Death?
pickup: "May life spring forth from the fallen"
description: Activates the Book of the Dead effect, spawning a bone orbital or charmed Bony for each enemy killed in the current room

title: XIV - Temperance?
description: When used, this card activates 5 random pill effects one after the other

title: XV - The Devil?
pickup: "Bask in the light of your mercy"
description: Activates The Bible effect (granting flight) and gives a Seraphim familiar for 30 seconds

title: XVI - The Tower?
description:
Spawns 6 clusters of rocks and objects that normally appear on this floor

It won't block any doors that exist

Rocks have a pretty good chance to become tinted rocks

title: XVII - The Stars?
description:
Removes your oldest item and spawns 2 pedestal items from the current room's pool

Can remove either passive or active items

Doesn't remove your character's starting items

title: XVIII - The Moon?
description:
Teleports you to the ultra secret room on the floor

The ultra secret room is a red room containing an item from the angel room item pool. Can only be accessed via the Red Key, Crystal Key or Cracked Key. Using this card will also open a pathway of red rooms back to the regular floor

title: XIX - The Sun?
pickup: "May the darkness swallow all around you"
description:
When used, grants +1.5 Damage Up, turns your hearts to Bone hearts and the Spirit of the Night effect (Spectral tears and the ability to fly) for the current floor

Also gives the Curse of Darkness effect that can't be removed for the current floor

title: XX - Judgement?
description: Spawns a Restock machine

title: XXI - The World?
description: Creates a trapdoor to a guaranteed crawl space

title: Wild Card
description: When used, this copies the effect of the card, pill, rune, soul stone or active item you used most recently

title: Soul of Isaac
description:
Turns all pedestal items in the current room into rotating items, which cycle between the old item and a random new item every second

This allows you to effectively reroll items like with The D6, but choose the old item as well if you want

Tainted Isaac has this effect passively for all items

If you use more than one in the same room, each pedestal item will cycle through +1 random item

Items are chosen from the item pool related to the current item

title: Soul of Magdalene
description: When used, all enemies in the current room drop half a red heart that will disappear after 2 seconds if not picked up

title: Soul of Cain
description:
When used, this Soul Stone creates Red rooms for every possible exit in the current room

Red outlines of doors appear where this Soul Stone will create exits for

See the Red Key item description for more information about these Red rooms behave

title: Soul of Judas
description: Activates the Dark Arts item effect, which turns Isaac into a ghost for a few seconds. While in this form you can walk over enemies to mark them for death. After a few seconds, he will quickly attack each target, chaining higher damage for each enemy it hits

title: Soul of ???
description:
When used this will cause 8 poison farts that leave a brown creep behind, and then drop 7 Butt Bombs very quickly

Standing in the creep gives you +1 Damage Up and +1.35 Tears Up

title: Soul of Eve
description: For the current room, 14 Dead Birds fly in from off the screen and attack all enemies, dealing low but frequent damage

title: Soul of Samson
description: Isaac gains the Berserk! effect for 10 seconds. This gives Isaac a bone sword and he goes on a killing rampage, gaining +0.4 Speed, +3 Flat Damage Up

title: Soul of Azazel
description:
Activates the Mega Blast item effect, which gives you a giant laser that deals x5 your tear damage per tick to anything in its path and pushing Isaac back by the force

The effect lasts for 8 seconds but does persist between rooms

title: Soul of Lazarus
description:
When used this kills Isaac and revives him with 1/2 a red heart. You get a couple of seconds of invincibility to move away after

The main benefit of this Soul Stone is that it automatically activates if you die, meaning it is effectively an extra passive life while held

title: Soul of Eden
description: Activates the D6 and D20 effects, rerolling all items and pickups in the room. Unlike the regular D6, rerolled items can pick from any item pool

title: Soul of the Lost
description:
When used, Isaac dies and becomes The Lost for the current room. This gives you his ability to fly, and the Holy Mantle effect. However if you take damage a second time you die like the Lost does

Same effect as touching a white fire, but only lasts one room

title: Soul of Lilith
description: Gives you 1 random permanent familiar

title: Soul of the Keeper
description: Spawns up to 25 random coins on the floor

title: Soul of Apollyon
description:
Creates 15 random Locusts

Locusts are variants of blue flies, except they have special effects based on the color

War (Red) - Explodes when touching the enemy. The actual explosion deals flat 60 damage

Pestilence (Green) - Poisons the enemy it attacks

Famine (Brown) - Applies a slowing effect

Death (Black) - Deals x4 damage instead of x2

Conquest (White) - Spawns 2-5 at once

title: Soul of the Forgotten
description:
Gives you The Forgotten as a temporary familiar, with 2 Bone hearts and his bone weapon. He behaves the same as how Esau works with Jacob, following your exact movements

Disappears after the current room or if he takes enough damage and dies

title: Soul of Bethany
description:
Creates 6 wisps, similar to the Book of Virtues effect

Mosts wisps will be the standard blue ones, but have a chance to have random special properties

title: Soul of Jacob and Esau
description:
Spawns Esau as a temporary familiar, who copies your exact movements the same as how the Jacob & Esau character works

Disappears after the current room or if he takes enough damage and dies

title: Gold Key
description: Once picked up, you gain unlimited key use for the rest of the floor

title: Gold Bomb
description: Once picked up, you gain unlimited bomb use for the rest of the floor

title: Golden Battery
description:
Fully charges your active item when picked up

Also, you take a full heart of damage when picked up. Doing this will cause this Golden Battery to reappear somewhere else on the floor

title: Golden Troll Bomb
description:
Spawns similar to regular troll bombs and cannot be picked up

However, they will explode forever instead of disappearing

The Safety Scissors trinket will turn this into a gold bomb

title: Golden Penny
description:
When picked up, will respawn again at a random location in the room

Every time you pick up a golden penny it has a 5% chance to disappear completely

title: Gold Heart
description: Once picked up, the gold heart will drop money on the floor the next time Isaac loses a heart

title: Bone Heart
description: Takes three hits to deplete and can be refilled with red hearts, but disappears forever when depleted

title: Rotten Heart
description:
Rotten Hearts fill up a whole container the same as normal red hearts, or the rightmost heart if you're at full health

Every time you clear a room, you'll spawn 2 Blue Flies for each Rotten Heart you currently have

title: Black Sack
description:
Spawns 2-3 pills, black/bone hearts and/or bombs when picked up

Can spawn in place of a regular sack, including in Shops for 7c

Only one heart can spawn per sack as a maximum

title: Rebirth Pills A - L
description:
48 Hour Energy - Fully recharges your active item and drops 1-2 battery pickups. Can be used with Placebo to generate infinite batteries

Amnesia - Hides the floor map for the rest of the current floor (same as curse of the lost). Can be negated with Black Candle

Bad Gas - Isaac farts, poisoning enemies around him

Bad Trip - Deals damage to yourself

Balls of Steel - +2 Soul Hearts

Bombs are key - Switches number of bombs and keys

Explosive Diarrhea - Spawns five live troll bombs behind Isaac, one per second

Full Health - Restores all your empty red heart containers

Health Down - -1 HP. If you have 1 or less heart containers, this pill becomes Health Up

Health Up - +1 HP

Hematemesis - Empties all but one red heart container and spawns 1-4 red hearts on the floor. Spawns coins as The Keeper

I can see forever - Opens secret room and super secret room entrances on the current floor

I found pills - Changes the appearance of Isaac's face for the current room (Cosmetic change only)

Lemon Party - Spawns a large yellow pool on the floor around you, damaging enemies which walk in it

Luck Down - Reduces your luck stat by -1

Luck Up - Increases your luck stat by +1

title: Rebirth Pills P - Z
description:
Paralysis - Prevents you from moving for a short while

Pheromones - Applies the charm effect to all enemies in the room for a short while

Puberty - Causes Isaac to grow hair for the rest of the run. Cosmetic change only. In Afterbirth+, taking 3 of this pill gives the Adult transformation

Pretty Fly - Gives Isaac +1 fly orbital, which blocks enemy projectiles and damages fly-type enemies on touch

Range Down - Reduces your range stat by -2

Range Up - Increases your range stat by +2.5

R U a wizard? - Tears will shoot diagonally for about 60 seconds. Effect persists between rooms while the time period is active

Speed Down - Reduces your speed stat by -0.12

Speed Up - Increases your speed stat by +0.15

Tears Down - Reduces your tears stat by -0.28

Tears Up - Increases your tears stat by 0.35

Telepills - Teleports you to a random room when used. Has a small chance to take you to the I AM ERROR room, and a smaller chance to teleport to a Black Market

title: Afterbirth Pills
description:
Addicted - Causes you to take a full heart of damage for all sources for the current room. Unlocked from Challenge #24 - PAY TO PLAY

Friends till the end - Spawns three friendly blue attack flies

Infested! - Destroys all poops in the room and spawns a blue attack spider on every destroyed poop

Infested? - Spawns one blue attack spider for every enemy in the room. If there are no enemies this pill spawns 1-3 blue spiders instead

One makes you smaller - Reduces Isaac's size and hitbox size

One makes you larger - Increases Isaac's size, but does not affect the size of his hitbox

Percs - Causes Isaac to only take half a heart of damage from all sources for the current room (The Wafer effect). Unlocked from Challenge #24 - PAY TO PLAY

Power Pill - Gives you invulnerability and the ability to damage enemies for a short while (similar to The Gamekid effect)

Re-Lax - Causes Isaac to spawn poops behind him while he walks for a few seconds. Similar to Explosive Diarrhea but with poop

Retro Vision - Pixelates the screen for a few seconds, obscuring your vision. Happens a total of 3 times over 30 seconds

??? - Gives the curse of the maze effect for the current floor. Unlocked from Challenge #25 - Have a Heart

title: Afterbirth+ Pills
description:
Feels like I'm walking on sunshine! - Turns Isaac invincible for a few seconds (similar to Unicorn Stump). Unlocked from the 'Sin Collector' achievement (collect every Bestiary entry)

Gulp! - When used will consume your current trinket, destroying it and giving you its effect permanently. Unlocked from the 'Once more with the feeling!' achievement (complete a victory lap, defeating the lamb boss)

Horf! - When used, shoots an Ipecac explosive shot. Unlocked from the 'Dedication' achievement (participate in 31 dailies in a row)

I'm Drowsy... - Slows all enemies for the rest of the current room

I'm excited!!! - Speeds up all enemies for the rest of the room. The effect triggers again 30 seconds after use and again 60 seconds after use

Something's wrong... - Spawns a pool of black creep beneath Isaac

Vurp! - Spawns the last pill you used. Spawns another Vurp! pill if no other pills were used yet. Unlocked from the 'U broke it!' achievement (collect 50 items in a single run)

X-Lax - Spawns a pool of slippery brown creep beneath Isaac

title: Repentance Pills
description:
Shot Speed Down - -0.15 shot speed

Shot Speed Up - +0.15 shot speed

Experimental Pill - Increases one random stat and decreases another random stat. Amount changed equals the equivalent stat up/down pill. If you have PhD it will only increase one stat

title: Gold Pill
description:
When used gives a random pill effect

Can be used multiple times, but every time you use it, it has a chance to disappear

The Gold Pill can spawn as a Horse Pill, which then causes it to give random Horse pill effects

title: Horse Pills
description:
Horse Pills rarely spawn as larger versions of normal pills with more powerful effects

Items that synergize with pills also have the same effect with Horse pills

In general, the effect of a Horse Pill is double the effect of a normal pill i.e. Speed Up will be +0.3 instead of +0.15. Pills with effects that can't necessarily 'double' are stronger, i.e. Pretty Fly gives a Big Fan item rather than a fly orbital

title: Dice Rooms
description:
1 Dot - Rerolls all of your items. (Does not change your trinkets, pills or cards)

2 Dot - Rerolls all pickups in the room. (D20 effect)

3 Dot - Rerolls all pickups on the entire floor

4 Dot - Rerolls all pedestal items on the floor. (Does not roll your devil deal items)

5 Dot - Reroll and restart the current floor (Forget Me Now effect)

6 Dot - Reroll all of your items and all the pickups on the entire floor (Combined 1 + 3 + 4 rooms)
